name: Spooky Sandwich
description:
A short VN made for the Spooktober VN Game Jam. It was made with Ren'py!

Assets made by Samantha Erickson, whose work can be found here.

Backgrounds, code and writing by me, Tristan J. Tarwater. You can find my work here.

All music/sound fx by Eric Matyas, via soundimage.org.

Special thanks to Allyson Willsey who is has mad resize skills and my Spouse who spent hours helping me get the game built because my computer would not update to the latest version of Ren'py. And thanks to the Ren'py discord!
